column2: In this survey, we would like you to tell us your opinion about the language we use in AdWords Editor. Please note that we would like you to think about the written language provided by AdWords Editor in elements such as buttons, messages, navigation or help text.

column2: How friendly or unfriendly is the language used in the AdWords Editor interface? By "friendly" we mean that the language used shows that AdWords Editor respects and likes their users.
